v: Oops, there's no briefing for this mission. Examine MISSION.INI and RA2.STR for examples of how to do this.

It is your good fortune to be in the vanguard of the Soviet assault on the United States. Lead your troops through Washington and destroy the most hated symbol of American military power, the Pentagon.
Objective 1: Destroy the Pentagon.

The Americans have foolishly gathered a fleet in a small harbor on the eastern coast of Florida. Assisted by General Vladimir in his Dreadnought, you will force a landing on the hostile shore and set up a base. When ready, you will strike out against the capitalist pigs and crush them under the iron heel of Soviet justice.
Objective 1: Force a landing and set up a base.
Objective 2: Destroy all enemy forces.

In order to complete our psychic beacon, we will need to capture some American technology. Lead your forces into New York and capture their Battle Lab. Then build a Psychic Beacon to take control of the city.
Objective 1: Capture the American Battle Lab.
Objective 2: Build and defend a Psychic Beacon.

The foolish Koreans have decided to take sides with the failing Allies. Their cowardly attempt to invade our Eastern territories will surely fail. Defend the motherland and, when you are ready, push the Koreans back into the ocean.
Objective 1: Establish a base. Defend the homeland.
Objective 2: Destroy all enemy forces.

The European nations are planning to join with the crippled Americans. We must not let this act of aggresion go unpunished. You will lay waste to their beautiful Paris. We will show the Allies the true meaning of power by turning their own precious monuments into weapons of mass destruction.
Objective 1: Energize the PARIS TOWER with 3 TESLA TROOPERS. Objective 2: Defend the PARIS TOWER from Allied attack. Objective 3: Defeat all remaining Allied troops.

The Americans are on their knees, begging for mercy. The last remnants of their fleet at Pearl Harbor waits helplessly for your relentless attack. However, we have news that the Koreans are not yet beaten and may attempt to join up with the American Navy. They must not succeed.
Objective 1: Establish a base in the Hawaiian Islands.
Objective 2: Destroy the Allied Navy.

The Americans have engaged their Chronosphere; a device that allows them to move soldiers across great distances almost instantly. They can now strike anywhere they wish. You must defend our Battle Lab in the Ural mountains. The Americans will surely strike there soon in a desperate but doomed attempt to shut down our development of the ultimate battle tank.
Objective 1: Defend your Battle Lab at all costs.

Even in the hour of our greatest victory, General Vladimir has turned against us. Tempted by the soft American lifestyle, he has gone rogue and convinced many loyal communists to turn against us. You must go to Washington DC and dig Vladimir out of his wretched hole.
Objective 1: Capture the White House.

Our victory is near at hand. The President has successfully eluded us, but we have tracked him to a dirty little fort called 'The Alamo' in San Antonio, Texas. You must use our Psi-Corp Troopers to mind control the President and force him to surrender the United States.
Objective 1: Use Mind-Control to capture the President.

In their final desperate hours, the Allies have managed to produce one last bit of super-technology. They have a Weather Control Device which they can use to create terrible storms that can sink fleets and level cities. We believe they have hidden their doomsday weapon in the isolated US Virgin Islands.
Objective 1: Capture the American Battle Lab to locate the Weather Control Device.
Objective 2: Destroy the Weather Control Device.

Yuri has turned against us. There is only one answer for such treason.
Objective 1: Destroy Yuri's headquarters - The Kremlin.

We have found the last feeble Allied stronghold. Their Chronosphere, now fully operational, can move soldiers anywhere in the world. They can strike at us in New York, in Prague, even in Moscow. Yuri's files show the device is located near Point Hope, Alaska. You must take what few forces we have in the area and lead an attack, before the Allies make use of their cowardly technology. This is the final hour, commander. Glory awaits.
Objective 1: Destroy the Chronosphere.

The Soviets have invaded. They outnumber us ten to one. You must assist special agent Tanya in New York. We are marshaling our forces as fast as we can, Commander, but we need time. A small American base, Fort Bradley, is in the New York area. If you can make contact, they may be able to assist in the defense of New York. Tanya will be moving through a chaotic battlefield. Keep your eye out for targets of opportunity and watch for new mission objectives.
Objective 1: Destroy the Soviet Dreadnought fleet.
Objective 2: Make contact with Fort Bradley.
Objective 3: Keep Tanya alive.

Soviet troops cover America like a foul plague. They have even penetrated our heartland to capture the Air Force Academy in Colorado. The Academy, its cadets, and the unique technology it contains are vital to our defense. Use Tanya to contact any American forces in the area, reclaim our Air Force Academy, and drive the Soviets from the area.
Objective 1: Capture the Soviet-occupied Air Force Academy Chapel.
Objective 2: Destroy all Soviet forces.
Objective 3: Keep Tanya alive.

The Soviets have invaded Washington DC and have used their evil psychic technology to mind control our leaders. You must rescue them by destroying the Psychic Beacon near the White House.
Objective 1: Destroy the Psychic Beacon.

Soviet forces continue to rampage across America. Our agents have discovered a large Psychic Amplifier in Chicago. If activated, this device will allow the Soviets to mind control all of North America.
Objective 1: Force a shore landing and establish a base.
Objective 2: Destroy the Psychic Amplifier before it comes online.

European forces still refuse to fight with us, fearing a Soviet nuclear counterattack. We have discovered the location of their medium-range missiles in Poland. Special agent Tanya has secretly crossed the Polish border. You will direct her to destroy the Soviet Nuclear Missiles.
Objective 1: Infiltrate the Soviet Battle Lab.
Objective 2: Neutralize the 2 Soviet Nuclear Missile Silos.
Objective 3: Keep Tanya alive.

The Europeans have joined with us and the time has come to counterattack. We will retake Washington DC and then we will retake the rest of our nation from the Soviet scum.
Objective 1: Reinforce and assume command of Allied forces at the Pentagon.
Objective 2: Destroy all Soviet forces in Washington.

The Soviets still cover most of the globe. We must continue to fight them wherever they may be. A Soviet fleet has been discovered en route to Hawaii. Destroy this fleet and the Pacific will be ours.
Objective 1: Destroy all Soviet forces.

Even as we cleanse America of Soviet forces, they continue to play with their psychic technology, desperately hoping that their little toys will destroy us. We have discovered a Psychic Beacon in St. Louis. Take special agent Tanya in and destroy the beacon.
Objective 1: Destroy the Soviet Psychic Beacon.
Objective 2: Destroy all Soviet forces within St. Louis.
Objective 3: Don't get Tanya killed.

The Soviets captured one of our west coast bases and with it one of our Prism Towers. We believe they may be trying to replicate that technology at a secret Soviet research facility in the Yucatan. A SEAL strike team is standing by, Commander, awaiting your orders.
Objective 1: Capture or Destroy any Soviet attempts to replicate our Prism Technology.
Objective 2: Eradicate the Soviet base defending their research site.

Desperate for some success, Soviet forces have counterattacked our European allies in Germany, moving deep into the Black Forest. No doubt their commanders hope that they will find and capture Einstein's laboratory. Your special talents have been asked for. The Germans fear they will be defeated without your strategic skills.
Objective 1: Ensure the safety of Professor Einstein's laboratory.
Objective 2: Destroy all Soviet forces.

Einstein has found the perfect place for his Chronosphere. Unfortunately this location is very close to Soviet-controlled Cuba. Build the Chronosphere and clear the area of Soviet nuclear missiles. We are nearly ready for our final attack on Moscow.
Objective 1: Build a Chronosphere.
Objective 2: Neutralize the Soviet Nuclear threat on Cuba.

The war is nearly at an end. A hand-picked group of volunteers will use the Chronosphere to invade Moscow from across the world. Once you have secured the Kremlin, Tanya will capture Romanov and put an end to Soviet aggression. You are the only commander skilled enough to make this work. Your forces will be outnumbered at least ten to one. Good luck.
Objective 1: Clear the area so Chrono Reinforcements can arrive.
Objective 2: Eliminate Romanov's Elite Black Guard around the Kremlin.
This is basic training. Listen to your sergeant and do as he tells you.
This is the last day of your basic training. Time is short and the Soviets may attack soon. Listen to your sergeant, learn what you can, and prepare for battle.

It's only a matter of time before Yuri brings the Psychic Dominator on Alcatraz back online. Our only chance is to use Professor Einstein's Time Machine to send us back in time and stop Yuri before he can complete his worldwide network of Psychic Domnators.
Objective 1: Capture Power Plants to power the Time Machine Objective 2: Defend the Time Machine Objective 3: Destroy the Psychic Dominator on Alcatraz

Yuri has mind controlled the population of Los Angeles and is feeding the civilians into his Grinders to fund his Psychic Dominator project. If we can eliminate the Grinders, Yuri will have lost a significant source of funds.
Objective 1: Destroy all Grinders in the city Objective 2: Destroy all Yuri buildings
Hint: Not all civilians have been mind controlled. Some of them may even be able to help us in the coming battle

Now that we've destroyed Yuri's primary source of funds, the madman has decided to take a more direct approach. Yuri has set up a Nuclear Silo in Seattle and is using it to extort money and technical expertise from the MassiveSoft corporation. We must save the city and MassiveSoft from Yuri's nuclear threat.
Objective 1: Destroy Yuri's Nuclear Silo Objective 2: Liberate the MassiveSoft campus

Yuri has captured Einstein in an attempt to expedite the completion of his Psychic Dominator Technology. It is imperative we rescue Einstein immediately and then rid Egypt of all Yuri forces.
Objective 1: Destroy Bio Reactors around Great Pyramid to rescue Einstein. Objective 2: Destroy Yuri's Base.

Yuri has established cloning facilities in Sydney, Australia. It is believed he plans to clone the world leaders. We must put an end to this operation at any cost.
Objective 1: Find and destroy Yuri's Cloning Vats. Objective 2: Destroy Yuri's remaining forces.

It's almost over, Commander. Yuri's plot lies in ruins. However, he still has one last Psychic Dominator located somewhere in his stronghold in Antarctica. Bring the abandoned Soviet Base on Tierra del Fuego back online and build a radar dish so that we can pinpoint Yuri's exact location. Then, with the combined might of Allied and Soviet forces, put an end to Yuri's plans once and for all.
Objective 1: Build a Soviet Radar Dish Objective 2: Destroy the Psychic Dominator in Antarctica Objective 3: Destroy all Yuri forces

Premier Romanov has been shot down by Yuri's forces. We must locate the Premier and take him to the airport so he can be rescued. Yuri has built a tough defense around the airport that we need to eliminate before the Premier's rescue will be secure.
Objective 1: Locate Premier Romanov and protect him. Objective 2: Destroy Yuri's base guarding the airport. Objective 3: Take Romanov to the airport once it is safe.

Yuri plans to launch himself to the moon after initiating his Psychic Dominator wave over earth. We need to install a base on the moon so we can build an attack force capable of destroying Yuri's moon bases and his Lunar Command Center.
Objective 1: Find a location to build a base. Objective 2: Locate and Destroy Yuri's Lunar Command Center. Objective 3: Destroy Yuri's remaining base.

Having failed to clone the world leaders, Yuri plans to capture the real ones. Defend them at the Houses of Parliament in London, England...then deal with Yuri.
Objective 1: Defend Parliament from assault. Objective 2: Destroy Yuri's Base.

The world is in ruin. Yuri is poised to rule unchallenged. Only a daring Allied plan to travel back in time stands between Yuri and total domination. But Yuri must pay for his betrayal at Soviet hands, not Allied. We must capture the Time Machine and travel back ourselves.
Objective 1: Destroy the Allied Navy and Grand Cannons. Objective 2: Destroy Pill Boxes around Time Machine to capture it. Objective 3: Capture 4 Power Plants to Power Time Machine. Objective 4: Take Control of Soviet Base and use it to Destroy the Psychic Dominator.

The Allies have discovered a Psychic Dominator in London, England. Yuri has taken control of the Allied strike force to help defend his near-complete Dominator. Free the Allies and join forces with them to defeat Yuri...but beware, the Dominator could become operational at any moment.
Objective 1: Destroy the Psychic Beacon. Objective 2: Destroy the Psychic Dominator. Objective 3: Finish off Yuri's forces.

We lost the battle here in the Black Forest the first time around and were eventually defeated by the Allies with the help of Einstein's Chronosphere. This time, we must not fail. Destroy Einstein's Laboratory and Chronosphere to ensure Soviet victory in our war against the Allies.
Objective 1: Destroy the outposts guarding the German border. Objective 2: Destroy Einstein's Laboratory and Chronosphere.

Hoping to hide from your onslaught, Yuri has retreated to his ancestral home in Transylvania. We can not allow him any respite or he will only rally his forces and return again to threaten us all. Eliminate Yuri now and forever!
Objective 1: Destroy Yuri's Fortress.

We have uncovered Yuri's secret Submarine Base on an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. The threat of Yuri's Boomer Subs must be neutralized!
Objective 1: Pick a landing zone and construct a base. Objective 2: Locate and destroy Yuri's Submarine Pen. Objective 3: Finish off all remaining Yuri forces.

Operation: City of Lights - Location: Paris, France

Operation: Polar Storm - Location: Point Hope, Alaska
Operation: Lone Guardian - Location: New York
Operation: Eagle Dawn - Location: Air Force Academy, Colorado
Operation: Hail to the Chief - Location: Washington DC
Operation: Last Chance - Location: Chicago
Operation: Dark Night - Location: Polish/German Border
Operation: Liberty - Location: Washington DC
Operation: Deep Sea - Location: Pearl Harbor, Hawaii
Operation: Free Gateway - Location: Saint Louis, Missouri
Operation: Sun Temple - Location: Tulum, Mexico
Operation: Mirage - Location: Black Forest, Germany
Operation: Fallout - Location: Florida Keys
Operation: Chrono Storm - Location: Moscow
Operation: Basic Battle Training - Location: Top Secret
Operation: Advanced Battle Training - Location: Top Secret
Operation: Time Lapse - Location: San Francisco, California
Operation: Hollywood and Vain - Location: Los Angeles, California
Operation: Power Play - Location: Seattle, Washington
Operation: Tomb Raided - Location: Egypt
Operation: Clones Down Under - Location: Sydney, Australia
Operation: Brain Dead - Location: Antarctica
Operation: Romanov on the Run - Location: Morocco
Operation: To the Moon - Location: The Moon
Operation: Trick or Treaty - Location: London, England
Operation: Brain Wash - Location: London, England
Operation: Escape Velocity - Location: An uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean
Operation: Deja Vu - Location: Black Forest, Germany
Operation: Time Shift - Location: San Francisco, California
Operation: Head Games - Location: Transylvania
Objective 1: Destroy the Pentagon.
Objective 1: Force a landing and set up a base. Objective 2: Destroy all enemy forces.
Objective 1: Capture the American Battle Lab. Objective 2: Build and defend a Psychic Beacon.
Objective 1: Establish a base. Defend the homeland. Objective 2: Destroy all enemy forces.
Objective 1: Energize the PARIS TOWER with 3 TESLA TROOPERS. Objective 2: Defend the PARIS TOWER from Allied attack. Objective 3: Defeat all remaining Allied troops.
Objective 1: Establish a base in the Hawaiian Islands. Objective 2: Destroy the Allied Navy.
Objective 1: Defend your Battle Lab at all costs.
Objective 1: Capture the White House.
Objective 1: Use Mind-Control to capture the President.
Objective 1: Capture the American Battle Lab to locate the Weather Control Device. Objective 2: Destroy the Weather Control Device.
Objective 1: Destroy Yuri's headquarters - The Kremlin.
Objective 1: Destroy the Chronosphere.
Objective 1: Destroy the Soviet Dreadnought fleet. Objective 2: Make contact with Fort Bradley. Objective 3: Keep Tanya alive.
Objective 1: Re-capture the Air Force Academy Chapel. Objective 2: Destroy all Soviet forces. Objective 3: Keep Tanya alive.
Objective 1: Destroy the Psychic Beacon.
Objective 1: Force a shore landing and establish a base. Objective 2: Destroy the Psychic Amplifier before it comes online.
Objective 1: Infiltrate the Soviet Battle Lab. Objective 2: Neutralize the 2 Soviet Nuclear Missile Silos. Objective 3: Keep Tanya alive.
Objective 1: Reinforce and assume command of Allied forces at the Pentagon. Objective 2: Destroy all Soviet forces in Washington.
Objective 1: Destroy all Soviet forces.
Objective 1: Destroy the Soviet Psychic Beacon. Objective 2: Destroy all Soviet forces within St. Louis. Objective 3: Don't get Tanya killed.
Objective 1: Capture or Destroy any Soviet attempts to replicate our Prism Technology. Objective 2: Eradicate the Soviet base defending their research site.
Objective 1: Ensure the safety of Professor Einstein's laboratory. Objective 2: Destroy all Soviet forces.
Objective 1: Build a Chronosphere. Objective 2: Neutralize the Soviet Nuclear threat on Cuba.
Objective 1: Clear the area so Chrono Reinforcements can arrive. Objective 2: Eliminate Romanov's Elite Black Guard around the Kremlin.
The British Sniper can easily eliminate enemy infantry at great ranges.
The USA has the best paratroopers in the world. Build an Airforce Command Center to drop paratroopers anywhere on the battlefield.
The French Grand Cannon is the ultimate defensive gun, firing at long range for massive damage.
The German Tank Destroyer can easily eliminate enemy vehicles. Its advanced armor-piercing gun is weak against enemy infantry and structures.
The Black Eagles are the most dangerous fighter pilots in the world. Korean forces are always well protected by these deadly air men and their lethal fighter-bombers.
Russian Tesla Tanks fire a short range Tesla Bolt that can short circuit enemy vehicles and even arc over enemy walls.
The Cuban terrorist is a fanatic for the Soviet cause and will actually carry a bomb right up to the enemy before detonating it, destroying himself and anything nearby.
The Libyan Demolition Truck self-destructs on an enemy target, setting off a small nuclear bomb.
The Iraqi Desolator can poison land with toxic radiation or annihilate enemy troops with his powerful Rad-Cannon.
Yuri uses mind-control and genetic mutation to corrupt the battlefield. His special units can seize the forces and structures of his enemies.
Objective 1: Capture Power Plants to power the Time Machine Objective 2: Defend the Time Machine Objective 3: Destroy the Psychic Dominator on Alcatraz

Objective 1: Destroy all Grinders in the city Objective 2: Destroy all Yuri buildings
Hint: Not all civilians have been mind controlled. Some of them may even be able to help us in the coming battle
Objective 1: Destroy Yuri's Nuclear Silo Objective 2: Liberate the MassiveSoft campus
Objective 1: Build a Soviet Radar Dish Objective 2: Destroy the Psychic Dominator in Antarctica Objective 3: Destroy all Yuri forces
Objective 1: Defend Parliament from assault. Objective 2: Destroy Yuri's Base.

Objective 1: Destroy the Allied Navy and Grand Cannons. Objective 2: Destroy Pill Boxes around Time Machine to capture it. Objective 3: Capture 4 Power Plants to Power Time Machine. Objective 4: Take Control of Soviet Base and use it to Destroy the Psychic Dominator.
Objective 1: Destroy the Psychic Beacon. Objective 2: Destroy the Psychic Dominator. Objective 3: Finish off Yuri's forces.
Objective 1: Pick a landing zone and construct a base. Objective 2: Locate and destroy Yuri's Submarine Pen. Objective 3: Finish off all remaining Yuri forces.
Objective 1: Destroy Bio Reactors at Great Pyramid to rescue Einstein. Objective 2: Destroy Yuri's Base.
Objective 1: Find and destroy Yuri's Cloning Facilities. Objective 2: Destroy Yuri's remaining forces.
Objective 1: Destroy the outposts guarding the German border. Objective 2: Destroy Einstein's Laboratory and Chronosphere
Objective 1: Locate Premier Romanov and protect him. Objective 2: Destroy Yuri's base guarding the airport. Objective 3: Take Romanov to the airport once it is safe.
Objective 1: Find a location to build a base. Objective 2: Locate and Destroy Yuri's Lunar Command Center. Objective 3: Destroy Yuri's remaining base.
Objective 1: Destroy Yuri's Fortress.
Britain can train SNIPERS.
America can use PARADROPS.
France can build the GRAND CANNON.
Germany can build TANK DESTROYERS.
Korea can build the BLACK EAGLE.
Russia can build TESLA TANKS.
Cuba can train TERRORISTS.
Libya can build DEMOLITION TRUCKS.
Iraq can train DESOLATORS.
Yuri has own tech tree.
Extreme Ham
Objective 1 Complete
Objective 2 Complete
Objective 3 Complete
Objective 1: Assign your infantry to enter the Psychic Isolation Chamber to save Premier Yuri, ATTENTION: DO NOT DESTROY THE CHAMBER.
ATTENTION: Premier Yuri came out, keep him safe.
MCV received, ready to build the base.
Reinforcements have arrived, waiting for your orders.
Objective 4: Send Premier Yuri to the helicopter and get out from here.
Satellite has reconnected.
HINT: Repair the bridge so that our forces can go and pass.
There's no ore or gems here, capture the OIL DERRICK to acquire resources.
Objective 3: Capture and activate the Psychic Beacon.
MCV is sighted! Go for it right now!
Repair the abandoned Psychic Beacon.
Objective 1: Capture the Allied Battle Lab, and control the Rocket Launch Pad.
General, here's an open space, you can land here and build the base.
Elite naval forces have arrived, awaiting orders.
ALERT: Allied Battle Lab is destroyed, we lost control of the rocket.
ALERT: Launch Pad structure lost. Mission Failed.
Objective 2: Destroy all enemy Allied forces.
Objective 1 Completed.
WARNING: Soviet naval forces detected.
Deploy your GIs near the entrance to your base for a better defense
The Premier successfully retreated. Mission Accomplished.
Now is not the time for potty breaks, Commander
No time to sit, Commander
WARNING: The stench of Red Team is in the air
Objective 1: Destroy all four Soviet DREADNOUGHTS
Objective 2: Rendezvous with FORT BRADLEY
HINT: Order your GI's to enter CIVILIAN BUILDINGS to fortify them
HINT: Fuel barrels explode if destroyed
HINT: Your base is out of power, build more power plants
HINT: Construct a BARRACKS in order to produce ENGINEERS to repair the bridge
HINT: GI's must DEPLOY to enter or exit their sandbagged foxholes
Objective 3: Destroy the Soviet SUPPLY BASE
WARNING: Soviet PARATROOPERS are incoming
Head NORTH and make contact with American forces
Objective 1: Use ENGINEERS to re-capture our base to the NORTH WEST
Objective 2: Destroy all hostile forces
HINT: Order an ENGINEER into any HOSTILE BUILDING to capture the building
HINT: Order TANYA to destroy the FLAK CANNONS
HINT: TANYA can swim
Objective 1: Clear enemy shore defenses with your Destroyers, then land and establish a base
Objective 2: Destroy the Soviet's Psychic Amplifier before it comes online
Estimated time until Psychic Amplifier is online:
Objective 1: Capture or Eliminate Soviet Research Facility within the Pyramid Ruins
Objective 2: Destroy the Soviet base
Objective 1 Accomplished
Objective 2 Accomplished
Objective 1: Destroy the Pentagon
HINT: Order an ENGINEER into the BRIDGE HUT to repair the bridge
HINT: Order your CONSCRIPTS to enter CIVILIAN BUILDINGS to fortify them
HINT: FLAK TRACKS can carry TROOPS into battle
HINT: Your base is OUT OF POWER, build Power Plants
HINT: Fuel barrels EXPLODE if destroyed
HINT: Capture the AIRPORT with an ENGINEER to allow your paratroopers to land in the area
Objective 1: Force a beach landing and build a base
Objective 2: Destroy all enemy forces
Vladimir: Now is the time to strike
Vladimir: What are you waiting for General? Do something!
Enemy Fleet detected
Vladimir has fled the battlefield!
Your Mobile Construction Vehicle has landed. Double-click on it to create a Construction Yard

Technology gained - PSYCHIC BEACON placed
Objective 2: Defend the PSYCHIC BEACON from Allied attack

Allied troops are now under Soviet control
Objective 3: Defeat all remaining Allied troops

Allied Forces have landed!
Objective 1: Establish a base to defend our motherland
Objective 2: Drive the Allied invaders back into the sea
Objective 1: Energize the PARIS TOWER with 3 TESLA TROOPERS
Objective 2: Defend the PARIS TOWER from Allied attack
Objective 3: Defeat all remaining Allied troops
HINT: Cars + Bombs = CarBombs!
Estimated time until Korean Fleet arrives:
Objective 1: Defend your Battle Lab against waves of Allied attackers
General Carville has stationed a truck near one of our villages; He has been broadcasting capitalist propaganda in an attempt to turn our people against us
I think we should send a few dogs to sniff out enemy spies
The first wave of Allied troops have entered the Chronosphere
Another Allied force has entered the Chronosphere
The final Allied troops have entered the Chronosphere
You've captured a powerful new enemy vehicle! Try putting different infantry inside to enhance the vehicle's abilities
CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST: Our Battle Lab has been captured
CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST: Spies have infiltrated our Battle Lab
CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST: Our Battle Lab has been destroyed
Objective 1: Capture the White House so we can apprehend the traitor Vladimir
Destroy monuments for cash bonuses from the Kremlin!
Objective 1: Use Mind-Control to capture the President
Use America's own soldiers against them
Enemy bases detected
Order spies to enter power plants to sabotage base power
Objective 1: Capture the BATTLE LAB with an ENGINEER
Build naval forces and invade the Allied base
Move north and reclaim our captured Kirov airships
Objective 1: Destroy the Allied CHRONOSPHERE
Objective 1: Clear the area so Chrono Reinforcements can arrive
Objective 2: Eliminate Romanov's Elite Black Guard around the Kremlin.
Objective 2 Accomplished - Romanov has been captured
Objective 1 Accomplished - Chrono Reinforcements can now arrive
Alliance formed with Soviet Defectors
Soviet resource stockpile detected
Allied chrono reinforcements in transit, arriving soon
Move your troops across the bridge
Objective 2: Deploy your MCV into a Construction Yard
Secondary Objective Complete
New Objective Received
HINT: Seals can SWIM and PLANT C4 like Tanya
HINT: Cars can be used to CARRY INFANTRY. To remove passengers, double-click on the car
HINT: Chrono Harvesters HARVEST ore and then automatically TELEPORT back to their refinery
HINT: Select the infantry TAB to view additional PRODUCTION OPTIONS
HINT: Order your ENGINEER into one of the REPAIR HUTS in order to fix the bridge
--Battle Control Online--
Additional troops gained
HINT: To REMOVE your troops, DOUBLE-CLICK on the occupied building
HINT: DOUBLE-CLICK the GI's to switch them between DEPLOYED and MOBILE states
These GI's have deployed their heavy machine guns.
Tanya has died - CRITICAL UNIT LOST
The STATUE OF LIBERTY has been destroyed - CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST
The STATUE OF LIBERTY is about to be destroyed - Hurry and destroy the Dreadnoughts!
HINT: To REMOVE your troops, SELECT the occupied building, then click on it again.
Keep TANYA alive!
TANYA has been KILLED!
so the ROCKETEERS can destroy the SENTRY GUNS
Objective 1: Destroy the Psychic Beacon
You have salvaged Allied units abandoned after the Soviet invasion
HINT: Beware of SOVIET TROOPS garrisoned in CIVILIAN STRUCTURES
HINT: Be careful NOT to destroy the White House... we don't want to endanger the President
MISSION FAILED: Nice job commander. You've managed to crush the President under a huge slab of concrete...
HINT: Send an ENGINEER into a damaged CIVILIAN STRUCTURE to repair it
HINT: Try putting different INFANTRY in your new IFV to use its morphing ability
MISSION FAILED: President Dugan is but a flattened shell of a man
Straggler units from across the Potomac have gathered up near the Lincoln Memorial
A brave group of Allied survivors has scraped together a squad near the Smithsonian
HINT: Order an ENGINEER into an IFV to transform it into a Mobile Repair Vehicle
Reinforcements have just arrived from our Canadian base
More reinforcements have just arrived from across Lake Michigan
HINT: Enemy SUB PATROLS are all over Lake Michigan. Land your transports quickly to avoid losses
Objective 2: Destroy the Psychic Amplifier before it comes online
HINT: Send INFANTRY into the HOSPITAL to restore them to full health
HINT: These OIL DERRICKS, if captured, will yield a steady flow of cash
Clear the shore defenses with your Destroyers, then land and establish your base
Objective 1: Infiltrate the Soviet Battle Lab with a Spy
Objective 2: Eliminate the two Soviet Nuclear Missile Silos
HINT: SPIES can disguise themselves as ENEMY TROOPS
HINT: To disguise a SPY, select him and left click on an ENEMY SOLDIER
Tesla Coil detected - CAUTION: EXTREME DANGER
Additional Spies have arrived
Allied patrol discovered
Secondary Objective Complete - NEW OBJECTIVE RECEIVED
Primary Objective Complete - MISSION SUCCESSFUL
Bovine rescued
Tanya has died - CRITICAL UNIT LOST
The Battle Lab has been destroyed - CRITICAL STRUCTURE LOST
First Nuclear Missile Silo destroyed - one remaining
First Nuclear Missile Silo has been captured - one remaining

Somewhere in Poland...
Signal Flare Detected

cloaks itself as a TREE and waits to ambush
passing enemy forces

Objective 2: Destroy all Soviet invaders
Objective 1: Construct a Chronosphere
Tanya lost
Kremlin Infiltrated - PRIMARY OBJECTIVE COMPLETE
Build a NAVAL YARD so you can construct SUBMARINES
HINT: Capture the OIL DERRICKS for extra resources
